headline: Indeed, Glassdoor cutting about 6% of staff; sites to merge operations
summary: Job sites Indeed and Glassdoor will cut about 6% of their workforce and Glassdoor will be folded into Indeed, parent company Recruit Holdings said.

raw.headline: Indeed, Glassdoor cutting about 6% of staff; sites to merge operations
raw.summary: Job sites Indeed and Glassdoor will cut about 6% of their workforce and Glassdoor will be folded into Indeed, parent company Recruit Holdings said.

headline: Analyst Sees Strong Growth Pipeline for Workday (WDAY) Amid Healthy Enterprise Demand
summary: Workday Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) is one of the 11 best debt-free stocks to invest in right now. On June 11, William Blair analyst Jake Roberge reiterated a Buy rating on Workday, reflecting his continued confidence in the company’s growth outlook. While no specific price target was provided, the analyst pointed to several drivers behind his positive stance. […]
